Klasse InputHandler

java.lang.Object
main.InputHandler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class InputHandler extends Object implements KeyListener
The class of the Input handler implementing Keylistener. Every Object has a collection of all keys with wether or not they are pressed.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    InputHandler()
    Standard constructor of the InnputHandler.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    boolean
    keyIsPressed(char c)
    Returns wheter a character is pressed or not.
    void
    keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
    Sets the boolean wheter the key is typed or not to true or adds the entry to the collection.
    void
    keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
    Sets the boolean wheter the key is typed or not to false or adds the entry to the collection.
    void
    keyTyped(KeyEvent e)
    Is not used but has to be implemented

    • InputHandler

      public InputHandler()
      Standard constructor of the InnputHandler. Only instantiates the collection.

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
      Sets the boolean wheter the key is typed or not to true or adds the entry to the collection.

      Parameter:

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
      Sets the boolean wheter the key is typed or not to false or adds the entry to the collection.
      Angegeben von:
      keyReleased in Schnittstelle KeyListener
      Parameter:
      e - The registered KeyEvent

    • keyIsPressed

      public boolean keyIsPressed(char c)
      Returns wheter a character is pressed or not.
      Parameter:
      c - The character to be checked
      Gibt zurück:
      boolean True if pressed otherwise false
